DataElement.preferredName: Image Plane Slice Thickness Float or Fixed-point Millimeter Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A string of characters representing either a fixed point number or a floating point number capturing the nominal slice thickness relative to the patient-based coordinate system expressed in number of millimeters.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The position and orientation of the image slice relative to the patient-based coordinate system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The position and orientation of the image slice relative to the patient-based coordinate system.

Concepts.definition: The position and orientation of the image slice relative to the patient-based coordinate system.

Property.preferredDefinition: A thin flat piece cut off of some object; anything resembling such an object.:The dimension between two surfaces of an object, usually the smallest dimension as opposed to the width or the length: also, viscous consistency.

Concepts.definition: A thin flat piece cut off of some object; anything resembling such an object.
The dimension between two surfaces of an object, usually the smallest dimension as opposed to the width or the length: also, viscous consistency.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/16/17 transferred context and added CSI, registration status per Round 5 finalization task.  6/25/12 versioned as part of Round 4 CRF review; upd to match 2011 DICOM and AIM modeling requirement.  6/21/09 Released for load of NCIAv4.4 model.  6/24/07 -CDE versioned to support DICOM CDE IE DICOM Attribute-DICOM VR Rep term format.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: DS MM: A string of characters representing either a fixed point number or a floating point number measured in millimeters.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number that can have its decimal point in any position.:A real number with a fixed number of digits following the decimal or radix point.:A unit of measure equaling one thousandth of a meter. (NCI):Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A number that can have its decimal point in any position.
A real number with a fixed number of digits following the decimal or radix point.
A metric unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter (10E-3 meter) or approximately 0.03937 inch.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 6/20/10 added Fixed Point CUI per VCDE review.   6/29/09 add mm as UOM 6/21/09 created for UOM Specific VD for DICOM DS Value Representation type to load NCIA v4.4 model.  10/27/08 - released post NCIA Interim Rpt Changes;  12/31/07 - chg long & short name to reflect "floating" aspect of value domain as indicated in the definition; semantics and max/min length did not change.  6/8/07-typo in def corrected.  6/4/07-Removed 15 decimal requirement.  5/10/07- Changed long to match Rep term qualifiers.  1/6/07-released VD so it can be reused in other imaging CDE.  1/4/07-2006 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 6/27/18 jk chg PQT case to "Slice Thickness" to match DICOM Standard.  6/21/17 jk Transferred Context, updated Pref Question, reg status per Round 5 finalization task.  7/1/13 associated with CT Image Acquisition CRF CSI. jc  7/11/12 - removed ACRIN CS/CSI reference in the caBIG context; ACRIN has added a reference in the ACRIN context.  6/25/12 versioned as part of Round 4 CRF review; upd to match 2011 DICOM and AIM modeling requirement. jc   7/11/11 added text short name.  12/2/10 added to PET Emissions Scan CRF CSI.  6/21/10 CDE superceded by CDE 3113183v1.0 as a result of VCDE CDE standard review.  12/16/09 - chg reg status to Proposed  6/21/09 created for UOM Specific VD for DICOM FD Value Representation type to load NCIA v4.4 model.   3/18/08 - updated with latest verson of VD.  no type or size change
